title: do double ninja zed please for a new skin.
body:
Double Ninja Zed effects :)     -

Q-Throws out zeds shuriken as well as shens blade at the same time.

W-His shadow becomes shen and when zed qs, only zeds shuriken will come out from zed but but the shen will throw out his blade instead.

E-Nothing Special here.

R-Zed summons 1 shen and a combination of zed with shen with him to dash the the opponent. Explosion is a purple shield with the shadow thing and after 3 seconds, it explodes with black and purple coming out of the enemy.
